titleStmt.title: Whereas some difference hath arisen betweene our subiects of south and north Britaine trauayling by seas, about the bearing of their flagges: ...
titleStmt.author: England and Wales. Sovereign (1603-1625 : James I)
James I, King of England, 1566-1625.

publicationStmt.publisher: By Robert Barker, printer to the Kings most excellent Maiestie.,

notesStmt.note: Title from opening lines of text.
Dated at end: VVestminster the twelfth day of April, in the fourth yeere of our reigne ... .
Specifying a new union flag to be flown on the maintop of both English and Scottish ships. Cf. STC.
Reproduction of original in the British Library.
